sn44.7:1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahamoggallanena saddhim sammodi.
sn44.7:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
sn44.7:2.1: “Kim nu kho, bho moggallana, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.7:2.7: “Kim nu kho, bho moggallana, antava loko”ti?
sn44.7:2.13: “Kim nu kho, bho moggallana, tam jivam tam sariran”ti?
sn44.7:2.16: “Kim pana, bho moggallana, annam jivam annam sariran”ti?
sn44.7:2.19: “Kim nu kho, bho moggallana, hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.7:2.22: “Kim pana, bho moggallana, na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.7:2.25: “Kim nu kho, bho moggallana, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.7:2.27: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.7:2.28: “Kim pana, bho moggallana, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.7:2.30: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.7:3.1: “Ko nu kho, bho moggallana, hetu ko paccayo, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti—
sn44.7:3.2: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va?
sn44.7:3.3: Ko pana, bho moggallana, hetu ko paccayo, yena samanassa gotamassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti—
sn44.7:3.4: sassato lokotipi, asassato lokotipi, antava lokotipi, anantava lokotipi, tam jivam tam sarirantipi, annam jivam annam sarirantipi, hoti tathagato param maranatipi, na hoti tathagato param maranatipi, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranatipi, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranatipi”ti?
sn44.7:4.1: “Annatitthiya kho, vaccha, paribbajaka cakkhum ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti …pe…
sn44.7:4.2: jivham ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti …pe…
sn44.7:4.3: manam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti.
sn44.7:4.4: Tasma annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti—
sn44.7:4.6: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va.
sn44.7:4.7: Tathagato ca kho, vaccha, araham sammasambuddho cakkhum ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
sn44.7:4.8: jivham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
sn44.7:4.9: manam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
sn44.7:4.10: Tasma tathagatassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti—
sn44.7:4.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranatipi”ti.
sn44.7:5.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbajako utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn44.7:5.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.7:5.3: “kim nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko”ti?
sn44.7:5.5: “Kim pana, bho gotama, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.7:5.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.7:6.1: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.7:6.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va?
sn44.7:6.4: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena bhoto gotamassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.7:6.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti?
sn44.7:7.1: “Annatitthiya kho, vaccha, paribbajaka cakkhum ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti …pe…
sn44.7:7.2: jivham ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti …pe…
sn44.7:7.3: manam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassanti.
sn44.7:7.4: Tasma annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam putthanam evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.7:7.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti va.
sn44.7:7.7: Tathagato ca kho, vaccha, araham sammasambuddho cakkhum ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
sn44.7:7.8: jivham ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati …pe…
sn44.7:7.9: manam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassati.
sn44.7:7.10: Tasma tathagatassa evam putthassa na evam veyyakaranam hoti:
sn44.7:7.11: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antava loko’tipi, ‘anantava loko’tipi, ‘tam jivam tam sariran’tipi, ‘annam jivam annam sariran’tipi, ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi”ti.
sn44.7:8.2: Yatra hi nama satthu ca savakassa ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidam aggapadasmim.
sn44.7:8.3: Idanaham, bho gotama, samanam mahamoggallanam upasankamitva etamattham apucchim.
sn44.7:8.4: Samanopi me moggallano etehi padehi etehi byanjanehi tamattham byakasi, seyyathapi bhavam gotamo.
sn44.7:8.5: Acchariyam, bho gotama, abbhutam, bho gotama.
sn44.7:8.6: Yatra hi nama satthu ca savakassa ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidam aggapadasmin”ti.
